name: CEMENTOS MOLINS INDUSTRIAL, S.A.U.
goal: Nuestra empresa dispone de una fábrica que produce y comercializa cementos Portland y de aluminato de calcio.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Iniciativas y reglamentación relacionadas con la producción y comercialización de materiales de la construcción.
